examples.example: 我许下了一千个美好的心愿，期待未来都能实现。

translate.english: I made a thousand beautiful wishes and expected that they all can be fulfilled in the future.

examples.example: 我存了一千元钱，准备用来实现自己的一个小梦想。

translate.english: I have saved one thousand yuan and am preparing to use it to realize one of my small dreams.

examples.example: 我跑了一千里路，只为追逐心中那灿烂的阳光。

translate.english: I ran a thousand miles just to chase the brilliant sunshine in my heart.
